To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don't use a simple average."}, {'url': 'https://chairinstitute.com/coaster-power-lift-recliner/', 'content': "The Coaster Power Lift Recliner Chair is a basic, no-frills power lift recliner, so it doesn't have a long list of features to use as selling points. The few features it does have though, are implemented very well, and if there's one standout, it is the chair's comfort. The chair's ultra-soft fabric and incredible amounts of padding work in tandem to offer the most luxuriant seating ..."}, {'url': 'https://www.thecoasterelevation.com/', 'content': 'Choosing The Perfect Furniture Has Never Been Easier. Our Greatest Advantage Is That You Can Buy Furniture At A 51% Discount.'}, {'url': 'https://www.honestbrandreviews.com/reviews/coaster-furniture-review/', 'content': 'The Coaster Furniture 3-Piece Counter Height Set Nut Brown is designed for the kitchen or other high-traffic spaces. It has a counter-high table and two matching stools in a warm, rustic brown colorway. The nut-brown color pairs wonderfully with the black leather seats that adorn the tops of the stools.'}, {'url': 'https://scamguard.com/review/thecoasterelevation-com/', 'content': "Beware of thecoasterelevation.com, a website notorious for its fraudulent retail practices. The website's design is eerily similar to other legitimate websites, suggesting that it has copied their content."}]
